title: Looking to trade away T206 cards for '55 Topps
author: Eric72

posts.post_title: Looking to trade away T206 cards for '55 Topps
posts.post_content:
Please see my, "About Me" profile and the album contained within.  I am building a set and would like to use cards I already have to fill some gaps.  The cards I need are listed in the album.

As for condition, I am basically looking for VG to EX...PSA 3 - 5 or comparable.

Best Regards,

Eric
